A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (Spoilers) Terrible movie. What a waste of one of the best sci fi heros of all time. Luke\, a Jedi freaking master\, just sits around pouting the whole movie then promptly dies when using the force. Also Finn’s only relevance to the plot is being Rey’s love interest\, so adding in Rose to pair with Finn was a terrible decision and a waste of half the movie. Kylo Ren is easily the most boring villain in the whole Saga. At least Snoke was somewhat interesting\, but they killed him off before we learned anything interesting about him.
